title: All Saints Novena
description: Unite with Heaven‚Äôs greatest heroes today. Pray this novena now and invoke the combined intercession of countless saints who reign with Christ.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

My heavenly brothers and sisters, from those most renowned to those of greatest obscurity, I come before you now in all humility and commend myself, and all who are dear to me, to your intercession. Pray for us always, that we may awake each day with a burning desire for the Lord whose Face you behold, that we will maintain an intimate personal relationship with Jesus, our Savior and Head, and that we will not hesitate to proclaim God‚Äôs greatness to others, and love them as the Lord loves us. As you offer your continual praise before the throne of God, I raise my heart to you now to implore your powerful intercession for these intentions (mention request here‚Ä¶) I am confident that your prayers on our behalf will be graciously heard by our loving and merciful Lord. By his grace, may we someday join you in the glory of the Father‚Äôs house.

O Blessed Saints of Paradise, the glorious Citizens of Heaven, as I render most humble thanks to God for all the good He has done you, so I ask you to remember me in your prayers, and obtain for me the entire remission of my sins, the amendment of my life, and imitation of your good spirit, and holy graces, that I may be perfectly reconciled to my Savior, and always please Him, but especially I recommend to you the hour of my death, that by your holy intercession my soul may depart this world in the grace of God, and immediately come to Life Everlasting. Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be All you holy men and women, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Answered Prayers From This Novena

I will be starting my prayers to Saint Homobonus tonight, I run a ballet school, and all my competitor have approximately 200 students and I have 30.

I love my students, and I help them as much as I can.

I have always read about this saint but never really prayed to him.

Now I will pray the novena and ask Saint Homobonus to multiply my students and help my business grow.

I will come back and tell you of my testimony, and how my business is now successful.

from M.T.

Novena to the Holy Souls in Purgatory

What is All Saints‚Äô Day?

All Saints‚Äô Day is a solemn feast, celebrated annually on November 1st.

It honors all the saints, both canonized (those officially recognized by the Church) and those who lived holy lives but have not been formally declared saints, all of whom have attained heaven.

The day is celebrates the Church‚Äôs dogma of the Communion of Saints, which explains the bond between those on Earth, those in Purgatory, and those in Heaven. It‚Äôs a recognition of the triumph of God‚Äôs grace in individuals and a reminder of the ultimate goal of Christians, to attain eternal life with God.

The feast can be traced back to early Christian practices of commemorating martyrs, particularly in Rome. It became a general feast for all saints by the 9th century, and Pope Gregory IV officially declared November 1st as its universal date of celebration in 837 AD.
